description: The Okemo Mountain Resort Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions,  base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Okemo Mountain Resort for the snow report
Alexa, ask Okemo Mountain Resort for latest conditions

name: Snow Report for Okemo Mountain Resort
shortDescription: The Okemo Mountain Resort Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry provides the latest ski and snowboarding conditions for Okemo Mountain Resort.
